name: ConfigConfigRuleSource
description: Source is a property of the AWS::Config::ConfigRule resource that specifies the rule owner, the rule identifier, and the events that trigger an AWS Config evaluation of your AWS resources.

properties.name: Owner
properties.description: Indicates who owns and manages the AWS Config rule. For valid values, see the Source data type in the AWS Config API Reference.

properties.name: SourceDetails
properties.description: Provides the source and type of event that triggers AWS Config to evaluate your AWS resources.
properties.typeDescription: List of AWS Config ConfigRule Source SourceDetails

properties.name: SourceIdentifier
properties.description: For AWS managed rules, the identifier of the rule. For a list of identifiers, see AWS Managed Rules in the AWS Config Developer Guide.
